name: Savor a Pisket Plate
description: Taste Jérémie’s signature pisket plate—tender goat meat with local spices, served with plantains and rice.

name: Visit the Fort of Marfranc
description: Step into history at Fort Marfranc and enjoy panoramic views of the surrounding valleys.

name: Attend National Flag Day Festivities on May 18
description: Celebrate Haiti’s history with music, parades, and patriotic speeches on National Flag Day.

name: Explore Anse du Clerc Beach
description: Discover a peaceful beach paradise, perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and fresh seafood.

name: Discover Macaya National Park
address: Massif de la Hotte, Grand'Anse, Haiti
description: Hike through lush forests, rare orchids, and unique wildlife in Macaya National Park.

name: Explore the Caves under Macaya
description: Venture into mysterious limestone caves filled with stunning natural formations.

name: Visit St. Louis Cathedral & Place Dumas
description: Admire the grand St. Louis Cathedral, then stroll through the charming Place Dumas.

name: Celebrate the Carnival of February
description: Experience vibrant costumes, parades, and music during Jérémie’s colorful February carnival.
